name: ARCO (Courtney Spivey, guljien, GamingCoder, suborn, mattyjenks, DeeCeeWorks)
name_original: ARCO (Courtney Spivey, guljien, GamingCoder, suborn, mattyjenks, DeeCeeWorks)
description:
(Created for the MetroidVania Game Jam)

Play as a robot through a dystopic Japan, set in an alternative reality where humans have long since perished. Scavenge and repair damaged body parts to become stronger, fight bosses, and discover the truth surrounding the world and you.

Use WAD and SPACE to move,

Left and Right Mouse Click to Attack and Special Attack, 

Mouse Scroll Wheel to switch between Special Attacks,

S to inspect objects, 

SHIFT to dash, 

F to regain health from enemy corpses, 

and E to open your inventory to upgrade items. 

CREDITS: 

Audio: Ryan B, Julian Gatt
Art: Daniel Cutajar, Matthew Jenkins
Design: Courtney Spivey
Programming: Sean Borg, Benjamin Gatt
